ygData.msgSnippet: ...  /rude Verant Thanks for the Wood Elf Cultural/Tunare Only fletching.  It really makes us Half-Elf Karana Rangers feel special........especially when
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Biltilie Dwimmerlaik" <biltilie@...>
>
> because some where talking about tradeskills in the recent posts,
> i want to point out the "EQ Traders Corner" at
>
> http://www.eqtraders.com
>
> and give the following hint: read ... ;-)
>
> especially players new to the game should checkout the pages, because
> there are many answers.
>
> the really bad thing about this page: there are sooooo many nice pieces
> you may make,

<rant>

/rude Verant

Thanks for the Wood Elf Cultural/Tunare Only fletching. It really makes us
Half-Elf Karana Rangers feel special........especially when you name 2 of
the bows after Karana, the God of Storms (Cloudburster, Thunderbolt).

</rant>

Sulamwen
Half Elven Pathfinder of Karana <Fate's Forge>
E'ci
